dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.service.perf.sls.ServiceLevelSpecification
dataStructure.description:
A pre-defined or negotiated set of service level objectives, and consequences that occur, if the objectives are not met.

This entity is abstract

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: ServiceLevelSpecification
